answers.answer: If you Google rib stretches in pregnancy there are some exercises that work amazingly. I've had the pain really bad, its only since she's dropped that it's gone. I couldn't even wear any type of bras it was that bad.
Hey there. I had the same thing wit my daughter she luved kicking me on my right rib too..it was very painful but unfortunately nothing my doctor could about..sorry
Put an ice pack on ur rib. It encourages the baby to move somewhere else and will give you a little relief
Thanks ladies!!! I'll try your suggestions. I appreciate it!

question: My baby camps under my right rib and doesn't move. I'm 32 weeks with gestational diabetes and my baby is measuring big so I know he's cramped in there. But my rib hurts so bad that I can't even move. It hurts to even talk. I know this just comes with being pregnant, but is there anything anyone has tried that helps?? Do doctors just tell you to suck it up? Please help.
title: Extreme rib pain!! Please help!
